attributes.action: Make parking in any disabled bays without a badge an offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more disabled people are finding it harder to have a 'normal' everyday life due to non disabled parking in disabled bays.  Currently only parking in bays on a public highway can be given a ticket for not displaying a badge but this should be extended to ALL disabled bays anywhere in the country whether on private or public land and penalty charges and points to be introduced for offenders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
